Text:
WOW !!!! Terrific !!!!  Easy install, works like a dream !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

thnx ! :-)
Worked like a dream! Thanks again!
Very Very Clean Very Fantastic, Great Contribution.

Warning:
Although you'd manage to get this software registered, the "key generator" (more like a license.dat file generator) will inject code into dwmapi.dll which I suspect to be malicious. 
You have been warned.
Awesome! No probs at all, thanks Adnan!

Working and clean! Double checked the dwmapi.dll and the code is safe. Don't worry, all is well.

Thanks adnan!

Installed perfectly!

Note to others: You don't enter a registration key into the program. just run the keygen after allowing the program to install.
no problem at all, works like a charm

hey LJUSALF, just click generate and save the file(license) to the location that opens. do this without the program running or it will not work and oh yea, thank you seeder for this. works like a charm and a great program to boot :-)
Do not use the included installer. (Old version) Download the installer from the Revo website, and then use the keygen here. Works beautifully.

@pmfabri : thanks for the advice
@adnan1102 thanks for the upload

THANKS UPLOADER WORKS WELL.MAKE SURE ITS NOT RUNNING WHEN YOU GENERATE THE KEY.TURN OFF THE UPDATE OPTION.AND TO BE SAFE BLOCK THE APP WITH YOUR FIREWALL SO IT CANT CONTACT THE INTERNET TO CHECK THE KEY.
KEY GEN WORKS WITH NEW VERSION.THANKS UPLOADER.TURN OFF AUTO UPDATE.BLOCK APP WITH FIREWALL.
Flawless installation! Works like a charm! The only way for uninstall that fucking HyperCam program.
